biotools.summary: Tool for the study of the combinatorial nature of post-transcriptional trans-factors. It allows the identification of clusters of trans-factors (RBPs and miRNAs) from interaction maps and it performs the biological characterization of identified clusters giving information about the overlap among the target genes, the GO enrichments and similarity among GO terms.

bioschemas.name: PTRcombiner
